name: Escape The Rooms:Magic Room Escape Challenge Games

description:
If you have any question, Contact us at https://www.facebook.com/Escape-Games-659801677521657/

The mystery and surprise magic house has a lot of puzzles, so far no one can solve the puzzles, can you figure out these puzzles and escape from it? Hurry to challenge it, see if you are the most intelligent man?

* Retro exquisite scene
* Exquisite puzzles
* No network, anytime, anywhere free play
